definition: to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: And the big money is with the brand advertisers.
sentences.chinese: 而且大品牌廣告商擁有更多的廣告費用。

sentences.english: The expenses on advertising and sales promotion will be shared between our two parties.
sentences.chinese: 廣告和促銷的費用由我們雙方均攤。

sentences.english: Yes, testing is expensive, but production outages can be more so.
sentences.chinese: 是的，測試費用相當高昂，但生產損耗可能會更大。

sentences.english: That is, with the same cost, a better con- trolling result can be obtained.
sentences.chinese: 用相同的費用就能達到更好的控制疾病的效果。

sentences.english: First, the heavy burden of personal cost.
He backed the costs of the new play.
sentences.chinese: 他同意承擔這出新戲的費用。

sentences.english: All arbitration fees will be borne by Party B and be paid in advance.
sentences.chinese: 涉及仲裁費用，全部由乙方承擔並預交。

sentences.english: The cost for the trip was halved by us.
sentences.chinese: 我們均攤了那次旅遊的費用。

sentences.english: There will of course be no charge for this replacement.
sentences.chinese: 這次換貨當然不會造成任何費用。

sentences.english: Regular maintenance work of the low cost.
sentences.chinese: 經常性的維修保養工作費用較低。

sentences.english: Prescription drugs represent only about one-tenth of all health care spending in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 處方藥僅佔美國醫療保健費用的十分之一。

sentences.english: How much alloted for annual marketing efforts in total?
sentences.chinese: 每年你可用於營銷活動的費用分配是多少？

sentences.english: Costs of repairs may be reimbursed.
B： By sea， please. Because of the high cost of railway transportation， we prefer sea transportation.
sentences.chinese: 請海運發貨，鐵路運輸費用太高，我們願意走海運。

sentences.english: During Training period, accommodation charge is wived .
sentences.chinese: 訓練期間，住宿營費用經已括免。

sentences.english: The cost is estimated at more than five billion dollars.
sentences.chinese: 擴建工程費用預計超過50億美元。

definition: expenditures/expenses/CL:筆|笔[bi3], 項|项[xiang4]/to spend money/(coll.) to pay wages
